entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.6°C

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind light except north 40 km/h gusting to 60 over southern sections. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 09 February 2023
